summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6220 for the improvement of the alley in Block 16, Pleasant Valley Addition, being the alley between 32nd Ave. West and 33rd Ave. West from Ruffner Street to West Bertona Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 88700, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
